cont.entity_a: Lens has spots that show up on pictures, possibly inside the lens.
Issues with flash not popping up were fixed after cleaning. Synchronizes to 1/500 sec in flash mode.
Camera body has a good feel and is durable. Solid and sturdy without being too heavy.
cont.entity_b: Hefty build aids in taking sharp photos. Well built, strong body.

cont.entity_a: Battery lasts long, but a second battery was purchased. One battery dies quickly, and the cord port is broken.
cont.entity_b: Battery life is amazing, lasting for many photos.

cont.entity_a: High quality images depend on the lenses used. Amazing picture quality and flexibility.
cont.entity_b: Image quality is crisp and clear. Excellent picture quality for the price range.

cont.entity_a: Advanced control algorithms worth more than the price paid.
cont.entity_b: Great price for a mint condition camera.

cont.entity_a: Allows more focus on creating photos. Easy to use and fun to experiment with. Easy to use in fully automatic mode.
cont.entity_b: Easy to use with a lot of features. Good for beginners and easy to learn.

cont.entity_a: Low noise performance is above average, ISO1600 is usable.
cont.entity_b: Noise is practically non-existent at ISO 200.
Compatible with old film AF and manual lenses. Easy to use with Nikon AI lenses.

cont.entity_a: Dependable for long-term use. Durability and reliability stand the test of time.

Shutter Speed.comm: Fast shutter speed allows action shots.

cont.entity_a: Latency is subsecond, suitable for action shots. Shutter speed and captured shots are impressive.

cont.entity_b: APS C sensor provides high-quality 6MP images. 6.1MP is sufficient for most needs.

cont.entity_a: Switch to turn on the camera is awkwardly placed. No true spot metering and loud mirror slap.
Bundled lens is adequate but consider upgrading for flexibility.
Good for quick pictures and learning features.

cont.entity_b: Camera was in great condition upon arrival.
Some functions did not work, leading to a return.
Connection problems and unable to view images.
